medical_history.chief_complaint: Evaluation and treatment of pruritic growths on the face, neck, and scalp.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's lesions and abnormal nails have been present for as long as she can remember, and she has been treating them with a variety of topical medications without resolution.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Stage 1 squamous cell carcinoma of the lung status post radiation treatment, severe mood disorder, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) with a smoking history of over 100 packs per year, paroxysmal supraventricular tachycardia, hepatitis, and osteoporosis.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's mother had similar lesions on her legs.
